framework.objects

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
      • framework.objects.CanvasObject
        • framework.objects.Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseControl, Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener

    public class Triangle
extends CanvasObject
implements MouseControl
    A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
    Version:
    1.0 (15 July 2000)
    Author:
    Michael Kölling and David J. Barnes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle()
      Create a new triangle at default position with default color.
      Triangle(int xPos, int yPos, int height, int width, Color color)
      Create a new triangle at a given position, with given size and color.

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(int xPos,
        int yPos,
        int height,
        int width,
        Color color)
        Create a new triangle at a given position, with given size and color.
        Parameters:
        xPos - the initial x position
        yPos - the initial y position
        height - the initial height
        width - the initial width
        color - the color

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize(int newHeight,
              int newWidth)
        Change the size to the new size (in pixels). Size must be >= 0.
        Parameters:
        newHeight - the new height
        newWidth - the new width

      • dispose

        public boolean dispose()
        Description copied from class: UpdateObject
        Disposes the object, means that it won't be updated anymore, the object will be drawn until makeInvisible() is called. After dispose() and makeInvisible() was called the object will be deleted!
        Overrides:
        dispose in class UpdateObject
        Returns:
        true, if successful disposed

      • update

        public void update(Time time)
        Description copied from interface: Updateable
        The update-method is called by the application for all updateable instances.

        Implement your code for animation here. If you want to check for mouse, key or window events, use the WindowControl, MouseControl and/or KeyboardControl interfaces.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Updateable
        Specified by:
        update in class UpdateObject
        Parameters:

        See Also:
